mapper.select: select * from reserve_stats where to_char(reserve_stats_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{reserveStatsDate} and movie_no = #{movieNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.MOVIE_NO, m.MOVIE_TITLE, m.MOVIE_OPEN_DATE, m.MOVIE_AGE, m.MOVIE_ON, rs.reserve_stats_rate, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM movie m JOIN reserve_stats rs ON m.movie_no = rs.movie_no WHERE TO_CHAR(rs.reserve_stats_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{reserveStatsDate} ORDER BY rs.reserve_stats_rate DESC ) WHERE rnum <= 4
